column1: Do you have a cough with mucus or phlegm?
column2: Are you experiencing chest pain when breathing or coughing?
column3: Do you have a high fever, chills, or sweating?
column4: Are you experiencing shortness of breath?
column5: Do you feel unusually fatigued or weak?
column6: Have you recently had a respiratory infection (like flu or cold)?
column7: Do you have asthma or COPD?
column8: Are you immunocompromised (e.g. HIV, chemo, steroids)?
column9: Do you smoke or have a smoking history?
column10: Do you have any chronic heart or lung diseases?
column11: Have you received pneumococcal or flu vaccinations?
column13: Are you above 45 years of age?
